trans-unit.source: This class identifies properties, not the values of properties.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe identifica propriedades, não os valores das propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Static objects of this type are found as fields of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and control pattern classes.
trans-unit.target: Objetos estáticos deste tipo são encontrados como campos de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>e classes de padrão de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"></xref> that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"> </xref> que encapsula um identificador numérico especificado.

trans-unit.source: Normally, properties are identified by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty> object.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, as propriedades são identificadas por um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to create such an object when only the numerical identifier (the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A> inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>) is known.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser usado para criar esse tipo de objeto quando apenas o identificador numérico (o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A>herdado de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>) é conhecido.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"></xref> that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"> </xref> que encapsula um identificador numérico especificado.
